Nightstrike:

Nightstrike fired 25 times in Aurora jet mode against Slaugther. He 
opened his comm link and said to Firestrike "Ok bro, do ya know the 
meaning of the word "Team"?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
> OOC: yes i suppose that would be a miss
> 
> ::FireSTrike::
> FireStrike turns dumbfounded not knowing why he attacked thin air. 
Now 
> seeig Slaughter he slices at him with the same effects.
> 
> 1641coburn@h... wrote:
> 
> > ::Slaughter::
> > 
> >      The blue flame and the sword missed Slaughter, as he was off 
the

won't have

> >  > >  > ressurected into Slaughter and be lost again!

eat

> > he

> >  > > from

then acted

> >  > >  > their was sticky things on his hands, and quickly went 
across the
> >  > > ceiling,
> >  > >  > avoiding the mega missile, and the rockets, and all shots

> >  > > headed
> >  > >  > at him(sorry for missing all those shots, but I didn't 
want my new
